title: [BUG] Dev version Installation does not work on Google Colab
body:
**Describe the bug**
Dev version Installation does not work on Google Colab

**To Reproduce**
```bash
# https://www.sktime.org/en/stable/installation.html#development-versions
!git clone https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime.git
%cd sktime
!git checkout main
!git pull
%ls
!pip install .
```

